'herakoi: command not found'
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
This might happen if the ``bin`` directory for ``herakoi`` is not included in your path. An easy fix is to run ``herakoi`` from script 

``...``

or directly from terminal as ``python -c "import herakoi; herakoi.start(*args)``, with ``args``
